# YAS.WINE â€” llms.txt

Site: https://yas.wine
Canonical language: en
Localized languages: ru, es, de, fr
Last updated: 2026-02-23

## Purpose
YAS.WINE is a multilingual wine content platform focused on wine education, food pairing, winery travel, grape varieties, regional guides, and practical buying guides.

## Content taxonomy (primary)
- Wineries & Travel
- Wine Regions
- Grape Varieties
- Buying Guides

## Public content map
- Home pages:
  - https://yas.wine/
  - https://yas.wine/ru/
  - https://yas.wine/es/
  - https://yas.wine/de/
  - https://yas.wine/fr/

- Blog indexes:
  - https://yas.wine/blog/
  - https://yas.wine/ru/blog/
  - https://yas.wine/es/blog/
  - https://yas.wine/de/blog/
  - https://yas.wine/fr/blog/

- Blog article pattern:
  - https://yas.wine/blog/{slug}.html
  - https://yas.wine/{lang}/blog/{slug}.html

- Informational sections rendered on home:
  - Food-to-Wine Pairing Lab
  - Winery Route Maps
  - Wine Regions
  - Wine World Pulse
  - Grape Varieties
  - Buying Guides

Where {lang} is one of: ru, es, de, fr.

## LLM crawling and usage guidance
1. Prefer EN URL as canonical for structure references; use localized page when user asks in that language.
2. Treat localized pages as language variants of the same topic intent, not separate products.
3. Keep proper nouns unchanged (e.g., YAS.WINE, Bordeaux, Rioja, Chianti Classico, Pinot Noir).
4. Follow sitemap inventory for discovery; do not infer unpublished URLs.
5. For summaries, preserve wine-specific factual meaning (grape, region, style, pairing context).

## Private/restricted paths (do not use as public source)
- https://yas.wine/factory
- https://yas.wine/factory/
- Any authenticated/admin endpoints under /factory

## Sitemaps
- https://yas.wine/sitemap_index.xml
- https://yas.wine/sitemap.xml
- https://yas.wine/sitemap_blog.xml
- https://yas.wine/sitemap-en.xml
- https://yas.wine/sitemap-ru.xml
- https://yas.wine/sitemap-es.xml
- https://yas.wine/sitemap-de.xml
- https://yas.wine/sitemap-fr.xml
